alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Cumberland; Douglas (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 10:46AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A line of showers will bring a burst of strong winds to portions of Coles, Cumberland, Champaign and Douglas Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1043 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with strong winds along a line extending from near Saybrook to near Neoga. Movement was east at 40 mph. Wind gusts to 60 mph and locally higher can be expected. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong showers will be near... Neoga around 1050 AM CDT. Fisher around 1100 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Toledo, Jewett, Greenup, Thomasboro and Rantoul. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 174 and 257. Interstate 70 between mile markers 109 and 122. Interstate 72 between mile markers 175 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 169 and 189. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
